Assessment.QuestionText: Which of the following statements about packaging and deployment are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: The application package consists of the files required to run the application.
The packaging process makes a single package holding only the assembly files.
The deployment process involves deploying the application as assemblies.
The packaging process uses the Microsoft Windows Installer technology.
The side-by-side versioning feature of deployment supports multiple versions of components.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(True), (B)-(False), (C)-(True), (D)-(False), and (E)-(True).
